attributes.title: Stan Stray Kids

attributes.review: I tried to download this app and it took two days to download, and when I opened it, not only was it glitchy and horrible quality but there was an ugly orange man on my wonderful screen. After opening the app I had a heart attack and died. When I made it to heaven I was informed that downloading the app allowed the corona virus to infect me and instantly kill me. Absolutely do not download this app it will kill you.

In my opinion the service was terrible I was getting kicked out of the app multiple times and it always asked to check my service.
And some of the information in the app was biased and fake you can find some of the information with a google search.
In my opinion this app has bad service and pure propaganda and this comes from a republican.
